title: Chief Complaint
instruction: Provide only the patient's chief complaint.

title: HPI Spencer
content: Bertha Campos is a patient who is here for follow-up. She has been working on her motion and feels it is improving. She wants to know if she can have her sutures removed. On examination, the incision is clean and intact with sutures removed today without apparent complication.
instruction: Summarize the History of Present Illness.

title: Musculoskeletal
content: Incision clean and intact with sutures removed today without apparent complication. Range of motion of the finger near full with tight fist without pain. Full active extension with no evidence of triggering. Moderate ecchymosis to the area consistent with post-operative state.
instruction: Extract physical examination findings related to Musculoskeletal.

title: Assessment
instruction: Generate concise list of active problems.

title: Plan
content: Sutures removed today as incision is clean and intact.
instruction: Write the doctor's plan as dictated.
